summary: Ricardo Bauleo Vicente  was an Argentine actor.
full_text:
Ricardo Bauleo  was an Argentine actor. He worked most on movies and television shows. His best known roles were in Blood of the Virgins , The Curious Dr. Humpp  and Los superagentes no se rompen . He was born in Buenos Aires.
Bauleo married Thelma Stefani in 1976 but they later divorced. He then married Gilda Lousek with whom he had two daughters. Bauleo died from heart failure after a long illness on 24 April 2014 in Buenos Aires. He was 73.
^ "Actor Ricardo Bauleo dies at 67". Buenos Aires Herald. 24 April 2014. Retrieved 25 April 2014.
title: Ricardo Bauleo
